page.title: 15SECONDARY SCHOOL EDUCATION.
page.content: We are pupils at{Billinge High School which is situated on{Preston New Road} in Blackburn.The school has{1200} pupils aged{11 to 16}and is a typical{ {Comprehensive}school.A{typical day}at Billinge starts at 8:45am when the pupils are{registered.}There are {assemblies}at 8:55, and the first lesson starts at 9:10.Each{lesson is {35 minutes}long,though some subjects last for more than one period at a time.The first{break}is at{10:20}and finishes at 10:35.After this there are 2 more lessons, and then the {lunch {break}starts at{11:45.}At 12:50 there is afternoon registration followed by 2 more lessons, and a 15 minute break at 2:05.There are then 2 more lessons and we go home at 3:30.
